docs: we booked this hotel ourselves as we arrived a few days early and it was the nicest place that we stayed .we were upgraded on arrival , to a beachfront room , which was a pleasant surprise .the place is clean with a wide beach front .the beach is clean and private with few canopies with beach chairs to relax watching the sea .the beach is neat and clean . excellent choice . </DOC> the room ( 4305 ) in the garden wing was spotless .the grounds are immaculate .negatives - housekeeping is very average .mirrors never cleaned , mould in shower from day one , face washers never replaced after first day .so there were many flies ! </DOC> our suite was massive - small kitchenette with espresso machine , dining area , lounge room , good size balcony with day bed and outdoor dining area , massive bedroom with 2 queen size beds leading into a walk in wardrobe and big bathroom .nice decor and everything very well maintained .only complaint is some ants in the room which kept appearing out of nowhere .suites are huge , clean and bright .the room was larger than an average hotel room and in good and clean condition with great bedding . </DOC> after much delay they agreed we could stay in the same twin for all six nightsthe layout is not the most modern ( i.e. does n't seem clear and open while walking to the rooms ) .the fountains were all working , the lawn manicured , pools cleaned etc .the room is very clean , spacious , and has excellent views of the beach & swimming pool .the suite was very clean and thoroughly turned out twice each day . </DOC> complimentary laundry and dry cleaning services , tailored packages including choosing your own bedding , room scent , music , to name a few .the hotel ... beautiful grounds , clean and spacious rooms -- we had two adjoining rooms with loads of space for our family of five .a little dated maybe , but perfectly acceptable .not advisable to swim or play at the beach as it is not that clean .the toilet was not clean ( see picture ) . </DOC> all we can think of is " new management " ? ? ? ?however , our ocean view room was poorly maintained and had a strong smell of mold coming from the closet and the there was calcium deposits caking off from the shower head and the hose in the bathtub . </DOC> some of them may or must to be cleaned .the resort was nice and clean , but was at 100 % occupancy with housekeeping : similar to my feedback directly to the hotel , cleanliness of room and standard of housekeeping can be improved . as a resort , i totally can understand if there are the occasion sand on the floors of the room , but having strands of long hair on place like bathtub is not acceptable .
